pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Warp is a modern, AI-native terminal emulator built in Rust for speed and responsiveness. It reimagines the terminal experience with a block-based UI, IDE-like editing capabilities, and integrated AI features.
Key features include: - AI command suggestions and natural language command generation - Block-based UI that organizes command output into discrete blocks - IDE-style editing with autocomplete and smart suggestions - Command palette inspired by modern code editors - Shared terminal sessions for real-time collaboration - Warp Drive for saving and sharing workflows and notebooks - Custom themes and prompts - Native Linux support with seamless Bash/Zsh integration
This package installs the official binary distribution from Warp.

use.flag: Enable Wayland support (experimental). When enabled, provides better integration with Wayland compositors, though X11/XWayland is still supported as a fallback.
